title: Giant Robo: Chikyuu no Moetsukiru Hi
original_name: ジャイアントロボ 地球の燃え尽きる日
sinopse: An alternate, slightly darker continuity of the Giant Robo OVA, featuring Daisaku Kusama amidst a power struggle between the International Police Organization (IPO) and the Magnificent Ten of Big Fire (BF group).
